column1: #Text=" Toph says : " Come on , lazy bones , let 's go .
#Text=" Sokka says : " He left his staff .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Aang 's not in the house .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look , there 's his footprints .
#Text=" Suki says : " So , he went for a midnight swim and never came back ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe he was captured .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't think so .
#Text=" Toph says : " I bet he ran away again .
#Text=He left behind his glider and Appa .
#Text=" Toph says : " Then what do you think happened to him , oh sleuthy one ?
#Text=Aang mysteriously disappears before an important battle ?
#Text=He 's definitely on a Spirit World journey .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But if he was , would n't his body still be here ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Then he 's got to be somewhere on Ember Island .
#Text=Let 's split up and look for him .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm going with Zuko !
#Text=Everyone else went on a life - changing field trip with Zuko .
